name: escalator-operation-direction
description: Enumeration defining the operational direction and speed of an escalator.

values.name: up-rated-speed
values.description: Escalator is moving up at rated speed.

values.name: up-reduced-speed
values.description: Escalator is moving up at reduced speed.

values.name: down-rated-speed
values.description: Escalator is moving down at rated speed.

values.name: down-reduced-speed
values.description: Escalator is moving down at reduced speed.
